name: Swarm of Ravens
description: A swirling mass of black-feathered birds that aggressively attack their prey with beaks and talons.
memorable: Can disorient and overwhelm foes through sheer numbers and coordinated attacks.
goals: Defend territory, scavenge for food, and harass opponents.
relations: Related to other swarming beasts and can often be found alongside scavenging creatures.
environment: Typically found in forests and areas abundant with carrion.
strengths: Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage; immune to many debilitating conditions.
weaknesses: Low strength and constitution make it weak in direct confrontations.
attacks: Performs a Beaks attack, dealing piercing damage with a swift flurry of strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Can occupy the space of another creature, making it difficult to avoid or escape.
senses: Passive perception of 15 allows it to notice hidden threats effectively.
skills: Proficient in Perception, enhancing its ability to detect hidden creatures.
additional_information: Highly agile, making it hard to pin down.
Can move through openings large enough for a Tiny creature.
In large numbers, becomes a coordinated dangerous force.
Does not regain hit points, limiting its combat sustainability.
Swarming behavior provides tactical advantages in combat.
test_queries: swarm of birds that overwhelms enemies
swarm with piercing attacks and mobility
agile ravens that scavenge and attack
